analyzed: lho phyogs kyi dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi gzugs rnams blangs la bdag nyid kyi gdong pa dur khrod kyi sol bas byugs la lag pa g-yas pa'i gru mo man chad khrag gis byugs la kha lho phyogs su bltas la ta la'i lo ma la 'khor

analyzed: de nas der gtor ma bdun btang la las las rnam par rgyal lo //
translated: Then, having offered seven oblations there, one will be victorious over the karma.

original: lan bdun nam bcu gcig tu bya'o //
analyzed: lan bdun nam bcu gcig tu bya'o //
translated: One should do this seven or eleven times.
